name: Greedy Ninja Thief
description:
This is the Greedy Ninja Thief that will steal your heart and all your art collection (Key E)! Now do not try to bite off more than one can chew or you will find yourself getting caught red handed as you only have a moment to pull of the job. If you get too greedy you can always sacrifice loot for speed (Key R). Hope you succeed!

Game Programmer: Balbino Aylagas

Game Artist: Patricia Alvarado

If you are feeling generous and can spare a coin as donation it will be really very much appreciated.
If you donated i wish it goes back to you tenfold in the moment you most need it. Take care.
